Nan Nourn is a doctoral candidate in the Department of Fisheries & Wildlife and Ecology,
Evolution & Behavior Program at Michigan State University. When not trekking deep into tropical jungles, Nan enjoys spending time with his pet cat Max and pet bunny Boca.
